folder: Cruger Avenue & Pelham Parkway South, Bronx, NY
original_title: Bronx: Cruger Avenue - Pelham Parkway South
text:
Cruger Ave. (in front of unfinished apartment houses), adjoining and at (right to left) the S.E. corner of Pelham Parkway South. The view is eastward across the undeveloped area between White Plains Road and Cruger Ave. This is part of the former John Jacob Astor estate.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
